column3: Portland stores after E. coli outbreakUPDATE 3-Chipotle shuts Seattle
column4: Portland stores after E. coli outbreak NEW YORK/LOS ANGELES
column5: Nov 1 Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc said on Sunday it had closed all its restaurants in two West Coast markets due to a reported outbreak of E. coli bacteria that is being investigated by the company and health authorities.  UPDATE 3-Chipotle shuts Seattle

column2: Morgan Stanley to face Russian tycoon's insider trading claims Nov 1 In a trial starting on Monday
column3: Morgan Stanley will confront a Russian billionaire's claims that it illegally short-sold a company based on inside information at the height of the financial crisis.
